channel.title: Need help with tabs
channel.description: I want to be able to make it so that on my [url=http://shaoshadowforces.ulmb.com/]website[/url], i can make all the tabs at the top work. (So if i click news, it would be like http://shaoshadowforces.ulmb.com/action.php?=news) How would I do this?

item.title: Need help with tabs
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

In action.php you would have a switch statement.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with tabs
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

I’d tell you how to do it, but mines is much complicated yet easy in a way. I can’t explain it, anyhow: Another way would be:

[php]

<?php if( $_GET['action'] == "=news" ) { include 'news.php'; } ?>

[/php]

then in your odmain you just put www.domain.com/somethen.php?action=news. I always played this into my index cuz I want everything to be loaed from there.

Read full topic
